Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Clinton.
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson and Van Buren, due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Clinton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Clinton, Harrison, Jefferson and Van Buren, due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Clinton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
